org.seedstack.seed.security.principals.SimplePrincipalProvider

  • Packages that use SimplePrincipalProvider 
    Package Description
    org.seedstack.seed.security
    Provides classes for securing an application.
    org.seedstack.seed.security.principals  

    • Uses of SimplePrincipalProvider in org.seedstack.seed.security

      Methods in org.seedstack.seed.security that return SimplePrincipalProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimplePrincipalProvider SecuritySupport.getSimplePrincipalByName(String principalName)
      Gets the SimplePrincipalProvider which name is provided.
      Methods in org.seedstack.seed.security that return types with arguments of type SimplePrincipalProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<SimplePrincipalProvider> SecuritySupport.getSimplePrincipals()
      Gets the user's SimplePrincipalProviders.
      A SimplePrincipalProvider is a name/value principal.

    • Uses of SimplePrincipalProvider in org.seedstack.seed.security.principals

      Simple principal to store the identity as a string
